instruction: Summarize the given paragraph in two sentences.
input: David was born in 1980. He grew up in a small town in Canada and was an enthusiastic student. He pursued a degree in engineering in a local college and was a star student.
output: David was born in a small Canadian town in 1980 and was an outstanding student in college, where he pursued a degree in engineering. He was an enthusiastic learner and a shining star in his college.
